# rotalabs-ftms

Field-theoretic memory for AI agents from [Rotalabs](https://rotalabs.ai).

Continuous field representation with natural decay and smooth retrieval.

**This is a placeholder package. Full implementation coming soon.**

- Website: https://rotalabs.ai
- GitHub: https://github.com/rotalabs/rotalabs-ftms
- Contact: research@rotalabs.ai
